price: To je Onaj Koji zna i nevidljivi i vidljivi svijet, Silni i Milostivi,
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
